#summary Information on the mzTab file format for proteomics results.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

----

= Introduction =

The mzTab file format is meant as a simple, text based, tab-delimited file format to report proteomics _results_. It is not meant as a replacement for the PSI standard formats such as mzIdentML or mzQuantML but as an addition.

= Format Specification =

The mzTab format is not yet stable. Therefore, the current version of the format specification can be found in the word document:
 [http://mztab.googlecode.com/svn/specification_document/mzTab_format_specification.docx mzTab_format_specification.docx] <br />
 [http://mztab.googlecode.com/svn/specification_document/mzTab_format_specification.pdf mzTab format specification.pdf]
